StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPendingRequestsForApplicant]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NwaGUID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT [ID], a.[NWA_GUID], a.FIRST_NAME, a.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, a.LAST_NAME, a.SUFFIX_CD, [RequestTypeID], [FormID], [RequestDate], [RequestStatusID], [RequestLevelID], [OSS_RequestDecisionID], [RS_RequestDecisionID], [District_RequestDecisionID], [Region_RequestDecisionID], [MCRC_RequestDecisionID], [LastEditDate], [LastEditBy], [ProgramID], [GradDate], [CommissionDate], [ReferenceText] FROM [ACP].[vwRequests] r INNER JOIN [ACP].[ext_MCRISS_O.cerContracts] a ON a.NWA_GUID = r.NWA_GUID WHERE r.NWA_GUID = @NwaGUID
